name: Super Truck - City
description:
Super Truck-City is advanced vehicle operating simulation game.

Operate All vehicles Like:
▶ Fork Truck
▶ Forklift
▶ Straddle Carrier
▶ Stack reacher
▶ Bridge builder[Girder Erector]
▶ Heavy Fork
▶ Mounted Fork
▶ Inloader Truck
▶ Automation Port Truck
▶ And more...

Use those vehicles to Load Containers, Unload Packages, Transport packages, pick, drop, shift: it is all possible in “Super Truck - City”.

Play the first 12 park packed levels for free, and with a single one time purchase unlock all 32 levels in game.

FEATURES:
▶ TOP NOTCH PHYSICS:
▶ GORGEOUS HIGH RESOLUTION VISUALS: Drive around authentically looking port, Warehouse.
▶ 24 AWESOME VEHICLES: Different shapes, sizes and utilities. Learn to operate them all!
▶ 12 FREE LEVELS: Drive super model vehicles.
▶ 24 PREMIUM LEVLES: Complete unique tasks each vehicle is suited to.
▶ Mass Girder erector for place or replace bridges.

Drive & operate exciting Toy style vehicles!
